channel.title: Server With The Client
channel.description:
If i have a server that requires a specific client (with 377 cache), which i also have but don't know how to fix, how do i make it require this instead? Cant connect to the server with this client because of that simple weird reason. So if you know, please reply.
Rep + For help btw.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 07:22:05 PM[/size][hr]Also, ive tried to connect with other 377cache clients, and it does work. So its like something telling the server it HAS to be 377cache, i just cant figure it out.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 07:44:41 PM[/size][hr]I got informed by Frell that this is not possible. Correct?

item.title: Server With The Client
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well, i did double post, but in a more information way

hmm i will se if thats whats he has added, but i dont understand hwo a sendFrame126 can make you disconect after joining without a 377 cache client. But will see when i get back home.

Read full topic

item.title: Server With The Client
item.dc:creator: @Steph2 Steph.
item.description:
@Steph2 wrote:

DONT double or more post

Anyway, the easiest way to disable mopar is this ( if this is what you want O.o )

put this in your boolean process

sendFrame126("You MUST Use A 377 Client Cache, Mopar Is Disabled.",18585);
Since mopar can’t handle them directly…

Read full topic
